Nodes.NPCDialogue: I see *PLAYER*. I will be there, I swear it.
Uhhhh... my name is Harry, not Henry *PLAYER*. I think I will pass on that. It seems you might not need me.
Oh hey *PLAYER*, how goes it? I heard the *REGIME* is coming in. What should we do?

Edges.PlayerDialogue: Blessings of *CULT NAME* upon you young Harry. The *REGIME* is indeed coming. We must prepare. I will be conducting a ceremony tonight. I would love for you to join in on it.
Blesssings of *CULT NAME* upon you young Henry. The *REGIME* is indeed coming. We must must prepare. I will be conducting a ceremony tonight. I would love for you to join in on it.
Young man, I feel like you take this very flippantly. I need you to show up at the *CHURCH* after sundown. Be there!
